location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letters No. 68-69 to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont and Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter discusses several administrative and financial issues. Letter also reports that the situation in Persia remains the same as described in the previous letter (IOR/R/15/1/3, pp 57-58).The letter includes a Manifest of Treasure, Pearls and Freight laden at Bushire on the Ship Mercury31 December 1780.
